title: Update Arduino Code section and site marketing copy for DHT11 (pin 6) + active-LOW relay (pin 8) + LED (pin 12) with 27°C/26°C hysteresis

requirements.summary: Replace the displayed Arduino sketch in ArduinoCodeSection with the exact user-provided DHT11 + active-LOW relay + LED hysteresis sketch and ensure copy-to-clipboard matches it exactly.
acceptanceCriteria: The code block shown in the Arduino Code section matches the user-provided sketch exactly (including pin numbers, active-LOW relay behavior, hysteresis conditions, and delay(2000)).
Copy-to-clipboard copies the updated sketch content exactly.
The Arduino Code section does not interpolate `thresholdC` into the sketch in a way that changes the provided code.

file_operations.description: Replace the current template-literal Arduino sketch (which interpolates thresholdC) with the exact user-provided code block text (DHT11 on pin 6, relay on pin 8 active-LOW, LED on pin 12, fanState memory, 27°C ON / 26°C OFF hysteresis, delay(2000)). Ensure the rendered <code> content and the clipboard copy source are the same static string so the copied text matches exactly.

requirements.summary: Update all Arduino Code section user-facing text to accurately describe the new pins, active-LOW relay behavior, 2-second sampling, and 27°C/26°C hysteresis in English.
acceptanceCriteria: Section title/subtitle, filename label, badges, and “How It Works” bullets describe: DHT11 pin 6, relay pin 8 (active LOW), LED pin 12, 2-second sampling, and hysteresis 27°C ON / 26°C OFF.
No user-facing text in this section mentions the old pin numbers (2/7) or the old single-threshold logic.
All user-facing strings in this section are English.

file_operations.description: Update Arduino Code section text elements (subtitle/description, filename label if needed, badges, and 'How It Works' bullets) to describe the provided sketch: DHT11 data on pin 6, relay-controlled fan on pin 8 active-LOW (HIGH=OFF, LOW=ON), LED indicator on pin 12, reads every 2 seconds, and hysteresis logic 27°C ON / 26°C OFF. Remove/avoid any mention of old pins (2/7) or single-threshold behavior, and ensure all strings are English.

requirements.summary: Update siteConfig to use a 27°C threshold and revise marketing/SEO copy to reflect 27°C ON / 26°C OFF hysteresis (not 28°C).
acceptanceCriteria: No `siteConfig` marketing copy or SEO strings claim activation at 28°C; copy reflects 27°C ON / 26°C OFF hysteresis.
The app renders without TypeScript errors after the copy/config updates.

file_operations.description: Set siteConfig.temperatureThresholdC to 27 and update any config-provided marketing/SEO strings that mention 28°C or a single-threshold behavior so they instead reflect 27°C ON / 26°C OFF hysteresis (overview text, features descriptions, and seo description/ogDescription where applicable).
